title: Harmonize Sociodemographic Package
text: Harmonize Sociodemographic Package aimed harmonizing sociodemographic databases Colombia, Peru, Brazil. primary objective structure centralize diverse data sources unified organized database. effort simplifies process accessing, consolidating, analyzing sociodemographic information, providing valuable resource researchers, analysts, everyone interested gaining insights sociodemographic landscape Latin American countries. Harmonize Sociodemographic Package developed research group BIOMAC Universidad de los Andes part HARMONIZE project.
